problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O的半径为5,AB为弦,点C为⁀{AB}的中点,若∠ABC=30°,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, AB is the chord, and vertex C is the midvertex of ⁀AB. If ∠ABC = N_1, the length of chord AB is ()
notes: 缺少弦中点的相关定理
raw_answer: 解:连接OC、OA,∵∠ABC=30°,∴∠AOC=60°,∵AB为弦,点C为⁀{AB}的中点,∴OC⊥AB,在Rt△OAE中,AE=\frac{5√{3}}{2},∴AB=5√{3},故选:D．
